name: The Final Slice
description:
Choose your ingredients, spend some breadcrumbs at the Mouse's shop, make the perfect sandwich, defeat Critters, and take on the dangerous Ratigan! 

...and check up on your Naan Nan. All in The Final Slice!

In this roguelike you take on the role of a slice of bread attempting to become the Ultimate Sandwich. Fight through the kitchen, pick up ingredients to power up, and face the boss.

Group Number: 02
